short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate eye-catching, cool and stylish texts for social media, messages, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate fancy, stylish and the coolest texts with Fancy fonts.

Fancy fonts are generated by using unicode symbols so there is no need to install the fonts to the computer. Just write your text and copy stylish text by clicking over the text that you liked. You can paste the fancy text instagram, facebook, whatsapp and other web pages.

Features:
- Copy fancy texts with just one click.
- Add fancy fonts that you liked to your favorites.
- View last copied texts to copy them again easily.
- Increase / Decrease font size to better accessibility.

Some Coolest & Stylish Texts:
𝔐𝔢𝔪𝔢𝔫𝔱𝔬 𝔐𝔬𝔯𝔦
